# Tutorials

This chapter provides step-by-step tutorials demonstrating
the use of `r pkg("hespresso")` with real RNA-seq datasets.
Workflows cover data preparation, normalization, and statistical testing
with HOBIT and HomeoRoq, illustrating practical strategies
to detect shifts in homeolog expression ratios across difference conditions.
